unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: College Football Coach
question_text: A college football coach has had a dismal year. The alumni association queries members of the alumni club. Of an SRS of $100\text{ members}$ , $64$ of them are in favor of firing the coach. Compute a $95\%$ confidence interval for the true proportion of alumni who favor firing the coach.
